mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inbody_records (user_id, height, weight, body_water, protein, mineral, body_fat, muscle_mass, muscle_body, muscle_left_arm, muscle_right_arm, muscle_left_leg, muscle_right_leg, bmi, body_fat_percent, measured_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{bodyWater}, #{protein}, #{mineral}, #{bodyFat}, #{muscleMass}, #{muscleBody}, #{muscleLeftArm}, #{muscleRightArm}, #{muscleLeftLeg}, #{muscleRightLeg}, #{bmi}, #{bodyFatPercent}, NOW());
mapper.select:
SELECT r.completed_at AS date, MAX(CASE WHEN e.name = 'benchpress' THEN rs.weight * (1 + (rs.count / 30)) ELSE 0 END) AS benchpress, -- 벤치프레스 1RM 계산 MAX(CASE WHEN e.name = 'squat' THEN rs.weight * (1 + (rs.count / 30)) ELSE 0 END) AS squart, -- 스쿼트 1RM 계산 MAX(CASE WHEN e.name = 'deadlift' THEN rs.weight * (1 + (rs.count / 30)) ELSE 0 END) AS deadlift, -- 데드리프트 1RM 계산 SUM(rs.weight * rs.count) AS totalVolume, -- 총 운동량 r.sum_time AS totalTime -- 총 운동 시간 FROM routines r JOIN routine_details rd ON r.id = rd.routine_id JOIN routine_sets rs ON rd.id = rs.routine_detail_id JOIN exercise e ON rd.exercise_id = e.id -- 운동 테이블과 조인 WHERE r.user_id = #{userId}
GROUP BY r.completed_at, r.sum_time ORDER BY r.completed_at DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT r.id AS routineId, r.title AS routineName, r.due_date AS dueDate, r.is_complete AS isCompleted FROM routines r WHERE r.user_id = #{userId}
